sentences.sContent: In certain fusion processes, among nuclei of the hydrogen isotopes, neutrons of high energy are liberated.
sentences.sContent_eng: In certain fusion processes, among nuclei of the hydrogen isotopes, neutrons of high energy are liberated.
sentences.sCn: 在氢同位素原子核中的某些熔合过程中，会释放出高能中子。

sentences.sContent: Some of this force is also supplied by neutrons, which outnumber protons in most nuclei and have no electric charge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of this force is also supplied by neutrons, which outnumber protons in most nuclei and have no electric charge.
sentences.sCn: 强核力的一部分也由中子提供，在大多数原子核内，中子比质子数量多，并且不带电荷。

sentences.sContent: Whenresearchers collided protons with lead nuclei, they were surprised to find that the result was teeny, tiny droplets of liquid.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whenresearchers collided protons with lead nuclei, they were surprised to find that the result was teeny, tiny droplets of liquid.
sentences.sCn: 当研究人员用质子和铅原子核相撞时，他们惊讶地发现，结果产物是极小的液体微滴。

synos.tran: 核心，核子；原子核（nucleus的复数形式）

phrases.pCn: 杏仁核；扁桃状核；杏仁巢
